locations.name: Docking Station
locations.description: Your space craft is docked and you see the remains of an old abandoned outpost.

items.helmet: final addition to your space suit

locations.name: Hydro Control Room
locations.description:
It appears to be an old hydro station-an essential part of restoring water to the outpost.
 There appears to be a helpful placard on the tank.

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description: An uncomplicated room with a mini fridge and a center island for prep space. This is where the snacks happen!

items.air_fryer: only the fanciest appliances for NASA's finest
items.freeze_dried_ice_cream: almost as good as the real thing

locations.name: Reactor
locations.description: A large room full of multiple screens, buttons and levers. The main power source for the outpost.

items.seeds: a small packet of garden vegetable seeds

locations.name: Green House
locations.description: A warm, glass-enclosed room with row after row of grow lights. Soil bags sit in the corner awaiting use.

items.pH_meter: useful for water or soil pH

locations.name: Sleep Quarters
locations.description: A quiet, dark, enclosed room. Bunk beds line the walls.

items.alarm_clock: simple time keeper to help kep you on track
items.r_key: a bit rusty but looks like it may fit in the reactor

locations.name: Solar Array
locations.description: a large field of solar panels still intact.

items.compass: not the map kind the math kind

locations.name: Environmental Control Room
locations.description: A room filled banks of servers and several workstations.
